content: the rose half_double_crochet shawl is a beginner friendly pattern that is the perfect project for showcase your favorite dk mini set for the sample i used the rose collection dk mini set you can find it and other gorgeous sets from hue loco here 1 using only half_double_crochet stitches and chain spaces the yarn is really able to shine in this triangle scarf - perfect for layering in the fall and winter months finished size 70 x 27 gauge is blocked - these stitches really open up once you wet block your piece 1 https //hueloco com/ sca_ref=3998095 kblqzpoetj
